metadata.name: Hamsa 01 | Guarding Fatima's Grave
metadata.description:
There are many misconceptions surrounding Islam...Islam is complex, diverse, and liberating.

Muslims come from all races, ethnicities and backgrounds. It's a global faith; Islam is one of the fastest growing religions today and is the world's second largest. Islam has always been full of strong women. 

Islam is Black & African. Islam is complicated and beautiful, with many unique traditions and stories, and a complicated history with colonialism.  

Islam has always been a home for the crafts, elevating them to a sacred art. It is a refuge for the sciences, and a sanctuary for mystics, sages, and scholars alike.

There would be no European Renaissance without Islam.

We come from a long line of skilled craftsman, artists, astrologers, astronomers, and poets. Islam is both magical and futuristic; Muslims exist in the future. 


This piece was created in memory & honor of Fāṭima al-Zahrāʾ (فَاطِمَة ٱلزَّهْرَاء). May her grave be covered always in libations and sweet offerings. Ashe.
